title: Envoy discusses matters of Pakistani Prisoners with Malaysian authority
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 14 (APP): Pakistan High Commissioner in Malaysia Syed Ahsan Raza Shah on Thursday met Commissioner General of Prisons Datuk Haji Nordin in Kuala Lumpur and discussed matters pertaining to welfare of Pakistanis in Malaysian prisons were discussed.
The High Commissioner thanked the Malaysian Commissioner General for regular consular access and facilities provided to Pakistanis.
In the meeting, it was agreed to maintain regular contact for early finalization of Transfer of Prisoners agreement.
